jobs.additionalPlain:
💼 Hiring Process

Candidates can expect the hiring process to follow the order below. Please keep in mind that candidates can be declined from the position at any stage of the process. 

- The first round is the CV screening, candidates will receive an email that contains a link for booking the next round. This process takes a maximum of one week.
- Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call specifically on Zoom with one of our global recruiters. For engineering candidates, after this interview candidates will receive an email and be asked to complete an offline code challenge. On average the candidates can finish it in 30 minutes.
- Next, candidates will be invited to schedule a 60-minute interview with two team members from the relevant team. For engineering candidates, the team will examine the quality of the offline challenge during the interview; one should also expect a live-coding challenge in 10 to 15 minutes.
- Finally, candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute interview with CXO.

We will collect the feedback from all interviewers and make a decision in a maximum of two weeks (on average it takes 5 working days). Then the candidate will be invited to another 15-minute call with our recruiters to discuss the terms of the offer.

jobs.descriptionPlain:
🙌 Who are we?

- A commercial open source company that focuses on MLOps platform for multimodal and neural search.
- Founded in Feb. 2020, raised $37.5M in 20 months. Now a global team of 50 with four offices: Berlin (HQ), San Jose, Shenzhen, and Beijing.
- One of the high-valued & high-potential AI startups in the world, featured on Forbes DACH AI30 2020, CBInsights AI 100 2021 & 2022.

😊 Benefits & Perks

💰 Competitive salary & stock options
🌎 Multi-cultural & diverse team
🎓 Numerous opportunities to present/attend top AI/OSS/industry conference
🦄 Rapid career development opportunities alongside the company
🏢 Central office in downtown Berlin, San Jose, Shenzhen, Beijing
⛱️ Free snacks & drinks, monthly team events, flexible working hours, home office options
💻 Macbooks & top-notch equipment

✨ Who do we want?

- You are passionate about multimodal intelligence and making it accessible to everyone.
- You want to work with the latest technologies and are fascinated by AI/ML.
- You are a fast learner and a team player and enjoy working in an async, distributed environment.
- You are proactive and take ownership of your projects.
- You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

As BD Manager -  Technical Partnership, you would get the chance to work with Jina's global marketing team to aid in building brand awareness, business analysis, lead generation, partnership management, etc. We want individuals with a flexible mindset, and strong management and leadership skills who have an eye for identifying current trends in the MLOps industry and open source community.

As BD Manager -  Technical Partnership, you would get the chance to work with Jina's global marketing team to aid in building brand awareness, business analysis, lead generation, partnership management, etc. We want individuals with a flexible mindset, and strong management and leadership skills who have an eye for identifying current trends in the MLOps industry and open source community.

lists.content:
• Conduct marketing research and maintain relationships with researchers in the IT industry. 
  • Provide in-depth analysis based on the status of key growth metrics. 
  • Build up a paid media marketing strategy including budget planning. 
  • Identify collaboration opportunities and build up strategic partnerships with cooperations.

• Major in Computer Science, Statistics, Business or other related Engineering field with Bachelor degree;
  • 3- 5 years of professional experience in data analytics, business analysis, marketing insight or consulting position;
  • Demonstrated experience in preparing and executing presentations of technical and business level data;
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and multilingual would be a plus;
  • Ability to interact with a broad set of businesses, presenting both over Proven track record of successful internal and external relationship management.
  • Strong team player and contributor.
  • Strong analytical abilities.

• Professional experience in industry study.
  • 3 years’ SaaS/Cloud product sales, business development, account management or consultant experience as an individual contributor.
  • Ability to work cross-functionally and with a wide range of employees with different skill sets and backgrounds.

lists.content:
• You will be expected to build and develop the different projects under Jina ecosystem with a huge focus on scalability and maintainability
  • You will have to apply the best development practices and make sure Jina is aligned with the best practices of containerization and cloud-native solutions
  • Your developments will have to put performance and scalability in the center and you will need to build good interfaces and abstractions for the users to interact with the frameworks

• Master in Computer Science or related degree.
  • 1y+ experience of building search systems. You will have the opportunity to work on problems related to search and AI, so good understanding of these technologies is great value
  • 1y+ experience with Cloud-Native techniques. Good understanding of web services, containerization, database, and modern software architectures.
  • 1y+ experience on multi-threading/-processing programming.
  • 1y+ experience on using Kubernetes and Docker swarm.
  • 1y+ of using Approximate Nearest Neighbors libraries, e.g. faiss, mslib, annoy, scann, and etc.
  • 1y+ experience on with Protobuf and gRPC.
  • Most of the stack is in Python, but we believe that experience in other languages and frameworks is very valuable. You will be working in a very dynamic environment where hands-on attitude will be greatly valued.
  • Passionate about search & AI technologies. Open to collaborating with colleagues & external contributors & designers
  • Maintained/contributed open-source projects, familiar with the agile software development process, CICD workflow, ticket management, code-review, version control etc.
  • Good English communication skills.

lists.content:
• 3+ years of experience architecting, designing, developing, and implementing cloud solutions on AWS/Azure/GCP.
  • 2+ years  of experience with Cloud Integration, Cloud Automation. Should be familiar with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Cloudformation etc). 
  • 2+ years of  experience using infrastructure technologies to run modern applications such as Docker, Kubernetes, or Serverless.
  • 3+ years of experience in developing software using languages such as Python, NodeJS.
  • Maintained/contributed open-source projects, familiar with the agile software development process, CICD workflow, ticket management, code-review, version control etc.
  • Good English communication skills.

💁 About this position

As a Developer Marketing Manager, you would get the chance to work with Jina's global marketing team to aid in helping deepen the understanding of the open-source community and serve as the primary source of contact between the user contact groups and Jina AI.
You will be responsible for enhancing the relationship with developers, driving the growth of our developers' community, and digging out insights from the community. We are looking for passionate community builders with great ownership, strong communication skills, and proficient project management skills.

lists.content:
• EMEA Event Management: Scout, organize, and promote events in EMEA region including self-host events, collaborated events, and sponsored events such as office hours, user group meetings, and conferences, hackathons. Improve events audiences' engagement journey with a better experience to drive conversion. Track event performance and generate event reports with insights.
  • Community Allies: Build and maintain relationships with EMEA tech communities and push forward collaboration opportunities. Be responsible for improving our product awareness among external communities.
  • Advocates Development: Identify key members of the community from EMEA region, including developers, power users, and influencers, and maintain good relationships with them. Empower European advocates to become community heroes and develop local communities such as in their cities and universities.
  • Community Insights: interview & User Story: Conduct interviews with developers based in EMEA serve as a liaison between the Regional community and the company, communicating community feedback to the appropriate internal stakeholders. Generate stories based on interviews to showcase the application of the Jina ecosystem.

• Bachelor's degree in computer science or a related field
  • 3+ years experience in community management and event management with proven achievements
  • Experience with open-source software development is preferred
  • Has strong English written and verbal communication skills
  • Proficient in German or any EU languages is a plus
  • Has strong project management skills and a result-driven mindset.
  • Passionate about AI and machine learning

lists.text: Requirements for this position would include:
lists.content:
• Bachelor’s degree or above
  • At least 3-5 years experience with technical community management and tech evangelism, preferably with a focus on the software industry
  • Excellent spoken and written communication skills in English. (Multi-language skill is definitely a plus)
  • Those with a passion to connect, network and engage with others and have the ability to convince and animate others with your enthusiasm
  • Individuals with an active presence on GitHub, personal website, Twitter, Slideshare/speaker deck, etc
  • Individuals with extensive contacts/networks in the North American and in the open-source/SaaS market and community
  • A clear desire to learn. We want individuals who are outgoing and active listeners.
  • We want high energy, outgoing team memebers with a “can do” attitude, who have ability to thrive in a changing work environment
  • Individuals willing to accommodate dynamic working schedules and are able to attend conference/workshops (including weekends when needed)
  • Individuals who are able to communicate and collaborate with distributed team (European central time zone)
  • Those with technical proficiencies in: AI, ML, DL, NLP, CV

jobs.additionalPlain:
💼 Hiring Process

Candidates can expect the hiring process to follow the order below. Please keep in mind that candidates can be declined from the position at any stage of the process. 

- The first round is the CV screening, candidates will receive an email that contains a link for booking the next round. This process takes a maximum of one week.
- Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call specifically on Zoom with one of our global recruiters. For engineering candidates, after this interview candidates will receive an email and be asked to complete an offline code challenge. On average the candidates can finish it in 30 minutes.
- Next, candidates will be invited to schedule a 60-minute interview with two team members from the relevant team. For engineering candidates, the team will examine the quality of the offline challenge during the interview; one should also expect a live-coding challenge in 10 to 15 minutes.
- Finally, candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute interview with CXO.

We will collect the feedback from all interviewers and make a decision in a maximum of two weeks (on average it takes 5 working days). Then the candidate will be invited to another 15-minute call with our recruiters to discuss the terms of the offer.

Your primary responsibilities would include:

lists.content:
• Promoting our products at related events: we would need you to develop & manage Jina related events strategically and with creativity
  •  Aid in the development with in-person & online events that are impactful in neural search, AI, opensource industries, that would further strengthen Jina and the company's ecosystem actively among the community
  • Plan and manage the all resources that are needed for events, partners, speakers, logistics, and budgets while encompassing a strong ROI mindset.
  • Create an analysis of event performance. Which would include de-briefings and wrap-up reports, to help the company's understanding in audiences and communities that relate to data-driven analysis.

lists.text: Requirements for this position would include:
lists.content:
• Bachelor's degree and above
  • At least 3 years experience with Technical Event Management and operations, preferably within the Software industry
  • Excellent spoken and written communication skills in English. (Multi-language skill is definitely a plus)
  • Individuals with an active presence on Github, personal page, Twitter, Slideshare/Speaker Deck, etc.
  • Those with a clear desire to learn.
  • Strong interpersonal skills and a active listeners are always a plus!
  • High energy, outgoing, team members who have a “can do” attitude and ability to thrive in a changing work environment
  • Individuals who can accommodate dynamic working schedules to support events (including weekends when and if needed).
  • Bonus Points: technical proficiency in AI, ML, DL, NLP, CV and those who can discuss machine data processing in SQL and integration

- You are proactive and take ownership of your projects.
- You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

As a Community Growth Manager, you’d be assisting in helping deepen the understanding of the open source community and serve as the primary source of contact between the user contact groups and Jina AI. We're looking for people with strong communication skills to advocate and aid our company's growth.
 
Your main responsibilities would include:
 
1. Serving as the primary source of contact of the community between users of the company's open source software products and Jina AI
2. To build and maintain relationships with key members of the community, including developers, power users, and other influencers
3. Help in understanding the needs and requirements of the community, as well as working with the development team to prioritize features and enhancements
4. Serve as a liaison between the community and the company, communicating community feedback to the appropriate internal stakeholders
5. Serve as an advocate for the community within the company, and work to ensure that the community's interests are represented in company decision-making
6. Help with organizing and managing community-focused events and initiatives, such as user group meetings, conferences, and hackathons.
7. Write and maintain documentation and other resources to help users get the most out of the company's open source software products
8. Monitor community activity and identify trends and issues of concern
9. Provide support and assistance to community members as needed

• Architect and develop the next generation of search systems powered by Jina to the Cloud using Kubernetes.
  • Help Jina become a cloud-native ecosystem for developing multi-modal and cross-modal applications.
  • Be one of the cloud-native evangelists inside the company. Your knowledge and experience need to impact every team in the company.
  • Take part on the design, development and testing of features.
  • Align with internal and external stakeholders on the requirements.
  • Participate on code reviews and help more junior engineers to grow.

• 3+ years experience with Golang.
  • 3+ years experience deploying applications in production with K8s.
  • Extensive knowledge about Kubernetes architecture and components (Controllers, Operators, CRD, ReplicaSets, StatefulSets).
  • Knowledge and interest on trends on Cloud Native world.
  • Team player and proactive.

• Python experience and knowledge.
  • Having experience deploying Machine Learning based products is a plus.
  • Previous experience with Search Systems.

jobs.additional:
We value the following mindset:
- Open communication, frequent and open sharing of knowledge and skills;
- Being decisive and be able to revise decisions;
- Result driven: Act and get things done;
- Inspire strong initiative and ownership at every level;
- Embracive towards different cultures;
- Embrace changes - we are a fast growing startup;

💼 Hiring Process

Candidates can expect the hiring process to follow the order below. Please keep in mind that candidates can be declined from the position at any stage of the process. 

- The first round is the CV screening, candidates will receive an email that contains a link for booking the next round. This process takes a maximum of one week.
- Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call specifically on Zoom with one of our global recruiters. For engineering candidates, after this interview candidates will receive an email and be asked to complete an offline code challenge. On average the candidates can finish it in 30 minutes.
- Next, candidates will be invited to schedule a 60-minute interview with two team members from the relevant team. For engineering candidates, the team will examine the quality of the offline challenge during the interview; one should also expect a live-coding challenge in 10 to 15 minutes.
- Finally, candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute interview with CXO.

We will collect the feedback from all interviewers and make a decision in a maximum of two weeks (on average it takes 5 working days). Then the candidate will be invited to another 15-minute call with our recruiters to discuss the terms of the offer.

lists.content:
• Build-up deep understanding of the tech stack and developer process used within for the Jina product suite
  • Assist in building and expanding Jina’s product vision
  • Help translate functionality into technical requirements and acceptance criteria
  • Manage daily product developer process , sprint , release and roadmap planning, making sure it aligns with higher level Product vision and strategy
  • Ensure the smooth collaboration with the engineering team and communicate any challenges to meet technical and strategic goals
  • Continuously update leadership team on current sprint status and planning cycle

lists.text: Requirements for this position would include:
lists.content:
• A Bachelors or Master degree in Computer Science or related fields
  • A solid Machine Learning background
  • Min. 1-2 years of experience in software development
  • Work experience in Scrum teams with sprints and those with a basic understanding of agile software development lifecycle
  • Initial experience with methods and tools used within Product development; e.g. user experience/ stories mapping, product roadmap building & PM tools
  • Individuals with excellent collaboration skills and ability to assist team members in reaching decisions
  • Strong (technical) communication skills, and the ability to write top notch and clear tech. Specs. and explain those who have key functionality in developers & designers 
  • Individuals with a deep interest in AI, search, and of course Open Source
  • Those with an aspiration to grow into the technical feature PM

• Build tightly integrated user-facing deployment pipelines for Jina based products, while working with the solutions engineering team.
  • Ensure application performance, uptime, scale - maintaining high standards of code quality and thoughtful design.
  • Participate in all aspects of the SDLC for cloud-based solutions, including planning, development, quality assurance, maintenance and CICD.

• 6+ years of experience in building/integrating software using Python.
  • 1+ years of experience designing, developing, and implementing cloud solutions on AWS/GCP.
  • 1+ years of experience using state of the art cloud-technologies to run modern applications such as K8S, Serverless etc.
  • Prior experience in building and managing live systems would be a plus.

For engineering candidates, after this interview candidates will receive an email and be asked to complete an offline code challenge. On average the candidates can finish it in 30 minutes.

lists.content:
• Working closely with the engineering team to contribute to our open source Python libraries
  • Working on actively implementing and maintaining features for opensource via the use of our data structure for unstructured data (Python library DocArray)
  • Expanding multi-modality support related to image, text, and audio processing
  • Engaging with the community on solving specific challenges and bringing these requirements into various projects
  • Supporting the community for Docarray and Jina repo by triaging and solving issues

lists.text: Requirements for this position would include:
lists.content:
• Individuals with a solid computer science background
  • Individuals with a deep understanding of algorithms, data structures and knowledge of how to write efficient code (time & space)
  • Individuals with a solid proficiency in Python, more specifically those with experience in writing/maintaining  python library/projects
  • We're looking for self-motivated and autonomous workers, who take ownership and initiative in their own work

jobs.additionalPlain:

lists.content:
• Contribute to all the components of the software stack, from the low-level training libraries to the cloud APIs and user interface
  • Build, test and maintain the cloud training infrastructure to improve the model performance and reduce costs
  • Collaborate with external teams and partners to integrate new features to the platform
  • Mentor other engineers in the team and have the ability to break down big tasks into smaller coherent sub-tasks
  • Promote the product by giving technical talks at conferences and meet-ups or writing instructional and technical blog posts

lists.content:
• To build a deeper understanding of the tech stack and developer process used within the Jina product suite
  • To be an active member in building and expanding the Jina ecosystem production strategy
  • Accountability of production strategy planning and execution, exL conducting solid market analyses to address proper GTM strategies associated with product development planning
  • Manage product development processes, sprint, release, and roadmap planning, making sure it aligns with higher-level Product vision and strategy
  • To ensure smooth collaboration between our engineering team and communicate any challenges in order to meet technical and strategic goals
  • To continuously update our leadership team on current sprint statuses and planning cycles

lists.text: Requirements for this position would include:
lists.content:
• A Bachelors or Master degree in Computer Science or related fields
  • Solid understanding of Machine Learning and AI technologies
  • Analytical minds, with experience in analytics/data insight product
  • Min. 1-2 years of experience in software development
  • Work experience in Scrum teams with sprints and those with a basic understanding of agile software development lifecycle
  • Individuals with experience in methods and tools used within Product development; e.g. user experience/ stories mapping, product roadmap building & PM tools
  • Individuals with excellent collaboration skills and ability to assist team members in reaching decisions
  • Strong (technical) communication skills, and the ability to write top notch and clear tech. Specs. and explain those who have key functionality in developers & designers 
  • Individuals with a deep interest in AI, search, and of course Open Source

jobs.additionalPlain:

🎓 Numerous opportunities to present/attend top AI/OSS/industry conference
🦄 Rapid career development opportunities alongside the company
🏢 Central office in downtown Berlin, San Jose, Shenzhen, Beijing
⛱️ Free snacks & drinks, monthly team events, flexible working hours, home office options
💻 Macbooks & top-notch equipment

✨ Who do we want?

- You are passionate about multimodal intelligence and making it accessible to everyone.
- You want to work with the latest technologies and are fascinated by AI/ML.
- You are a fast learner and a team player and enjoy working in an async, distributed environment.
- You are proactive and take ownership of your projects.
- You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

What you should bring to the team:
- A passion and deep understanding about deep learning, multi-modal representation learning and their applications (e.g.: search and creative AI)
- A passion for deploying and scaling up complex machine learning workflows on the cloud
- A motivation for solving real-world problems and delivering outstanding user experiences
- A team player mindset, where you enjoy working in a collaborative environment
- A proactive take on ownership of your projects

lists.content:
• Contribute to all the components of the software stack, from the low-level training libraries to the cloud APIs and user interface
  • Build, test and maintain the cloud training infrastructure to improve the model performance and reduce costs
  • Collaborate with external teams and partners to integrate new features to the platform
  • Mentor other engineers in the team and have the ability to break down big tasks into smaller coherent sub-tasks
  • Promote the product by giving technical talks at conferences and meet-ups or writing instructional and technical blog posts

jobs.additionalPlain:
Qualifications:
- Bachelors Degree or higher 
- Experience in building ML related APIs and microservices
- Competent in cloud technologies, especially Docker, Kubernetes and AWS
- Strong English language skills
- 3+ years of experience in building/integrating software using Python
- (Bonus) Experience working with training and inference optimization techniques, such as runtime/inference engines
- (Bonus) Experience with major ML frameworks - Pytorch, JAX, Tensorflow



💼 Hiring Process

Candidates can expect the hiring process to follow the order below. Please keep in mind that candidates can be declined from the position at any stage of the process. 

- The first round is the CV screening, candidates will receive an email that contains a link for booking the next round. This process takes a maximum of one week.
- Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call specifically on Zoom with one of our global recruiters. For engineering candidates, after this interview candidates will receive an email and be asked to complete an offline code challenge. On average the candidates can finish it in 30 minutes.
- Next, candidates will be invited to schedule a 60-minute interview with two team members from the relevant team. For engineering candidates, the team will examine the quality of the offline challenge during the interview; one should also expect a live-coding challenge in 10 to 15 minutes.
- Finally, candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute interview with CXO.

We will collect the feedback from all interviewers and make a decision in a maximum of two weeks (on average it takes 5 working days). Then the candidate will be invited to another 15-minute call with our recruiters to discuss the terms of the offer.

💁 About this position

Jina AI is looking for a Technical Recruiter to join our HR department and help us grow our teams.

Technical Recruiter responsibilities include sourcing, screening and providing a shortlist of qualified candidates for various technical roles. You will also network online and offline with potential candidates to promote our employer brand, reduce our time-to-hire and ensure we attract the best professionals.

lists.content:
• Post and optimize our technical job descriptions
  • Source potential candidates on niche platforms and social media, like Stack Overflow, Github, Linkedin and Xing.
  • Parse specialized skills and qualifications to screen IT resumes
  • Interview candidates
  • Coordinate with IT team leaders to forecast department goals and hiring needs
  • Craft and send personalized recruiting emails with current job openings to passive candidates
  • Participate in tech conferences and meetups to network with IT professionals
  • Promote company’s reputation as a great place to work
  • Conduct job and task analyses to document job duties and requirements
  • Keep up-to-date with new technological trends and products

• 5 years of work experience as a Technical Recruiter or Recruiter
  • Hands-on experience with various interview formats (e.g. Zoom)
  • Technical expertise with an ability to understand and explain job requirements for IT roles
  • Familiarity with Applicant Tracking Systems and resume databases
  • Solid knowledge of sourcing techniques (e.g. social media recruiting and Boolean search)
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Solid understanding of HR practices and labor legislation
  • BSc in Human Resources Management, IT or relevant degree

lists.content:
• Work closely with engineering teams to enhance deployment strategies for higher reliability of Jina's Cloud services.
  • Build & improve observability stack, streamline & automate Ops processes (incident, problem Management) for different Cloud services.
  • Provide reliable technical support and mentorship on complex issues in a high velocity, dynamic environment.
  • Be a part of the on-call team for production issues during shift or as required.

• 2+ years experience in building and managing infrastructure on AWS / Azure / GCP.
  • You have owned & operated production scale Kubernetes clusters with exposure to vendor specific Kubernetes solutions such as EKS, AKS and GKE.
  • Solid knowledge of logging, monitoring and observability platforms (Prometheus/Grafana/Jaeger) with large scale distributed systems.
  • 1+ years of experience with cloud automation and infrastructure as code (Terraform/Cloudformation/Helm).
  • Familiarity with at least one programming language, preferably Golang or Python.
  • Experience managing critical production infrastructure, maintaining reliability and uptime, and having a customer first view of operational safety.

lists.content:

  • 1y+ experience of building search systems
  • 1y+ experience with Cloud-Native techniques. Good understanding of web services, containerization, database, and modern software architectures.
  • 1y+ experience on multi-threading/-processing programming.
  • 1y+ experience on using Kubernetes and Docker swarm.
  • 1y+ of using Approximate Nearest Neighbors libraries, e.g. faiss, mslib, annoy, scann, and etc.
  • 1y+ experience on with Protobuf and gRPC.
  • Passionate about search & AI technologies. Open to collaborating with colleagues & external contributors & designers
  • Maintained/contributed open-source projects, familiar with the agile software development process, CICD workflow, ticket management, code-review, version control etc.
  • Good English communication skills.

- You have excellent communication skills in English.

💁 About this position

As a Software Engineer Intern you would get the opportunity in helping assist our engineering team in expanding our Neural search ecosystem, while gaining hands on experience on learning about and actively contributing to the opensource community.

lists.content:
• You'd be an active team member in our engineering team and would assist them in building a Neural Search ecosystem in open source (https://get.jina.ai)
  • Assist in build integration & benchmark tools for Jina
  • Integrate port AI models (NLP, CV, ...) into Jina Hub
  • Assist in building innovative examples with Jina and publish blog posts
  • Assist in the improvement of tests & docstring coverage for Jina

lists.text: Requirements for this position would include:
lists.content:
• We're looking for self-motivated and autonomous workers, who take ownership and initiative in their own work
  • Individuals with >2 years Python experience
  • Individuals with experience in Docker, Bash, CICD
  • Active contributors to opensource projects

jobs.additionalPlain:
💼 Hiring Process

Candidates can expect the hiring process to follow the order below. Please keep in mind that candidates can be declined from the position at any stage of the process. 

- The first round is the CV screening, candidates will receive an email that contains a link for booking the next round. This process takes a maximum of one week.
- Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute screening call specifically on Zoom with one of our global recruiters. For engineering candidates, after this interview candidates will receive an email and be asked to complete an offline code challenge. On average the candidates can finish it in 30 minutes.
- Next, candidates will be invited to schedule a 60-minute interview with two team members from the relevant team. For engineering candidates, the team will examine the quality of the offline challenge during the interview; one should also expect a live-coding challenge in 10 to 15 minutes.
- Finally, candidates will be invited to schedule a 30-minute interview with CXO.

We will collect the feedback from all interviewers and make a decision in a maximum of two weeks (on average it takes 5 working days). Then the candidate will be invited to another 15-minute call with our recruiters to discuss the terms of the offer.

lists.content:
• M.Sc. in Computer Science or related degree.
  • Apply broad technical knowledge to architect solutions that meet business and IT needs for customers.
  • Develop deep relationships with key customer IT decision-makers and relevant business decision-makers, who drive long-term technical adoption within their company to enable them to be future advocates.
  • 2y+ experience on Cloud-Native techniques. Good understanding of web services, containerization, database, and modern software architectures.
  • Maintain technical skills and knowledge, keeping up-to-date with market trends and competitive insights; collaborate and share with the technical community while educating customers.
  • Passionate about search & AI technologies. Open to collaborating with colleagues & external contributors & designers.
  • Be a Voice of Customer to share insights and best practices, connect with the Engineering team to remove key blockers.
  • Good English writing skills.

For our (Senior) Technical Product Manager - Cloud/SaaS, we are seeking individuals with strong technical and product management skills that can combine insights from customers, the market, and the open source community to grow Jina AI’s cloud platform.

lists.content:
• Working across the teams to understand the technical architectures and define 1,3,6 month goals
  • Understand how to integrate with other cloud/OS projects
  • Define strategy, pricing & GTM for our cloud offerings and dashboard
  • Collaborate with all members across the company among our Engineers, UX, Developer Relations, and product teams to provide maximum value to our customers;

lists.text: Requirements for this position would include:
lists.content:
• (Must have) 2y+ experience in product management and preferably 3y+ engineering experience in delivering cloud-based technologies (bonus if B2B)
  • (Must have) Knowledge and hands-on experience with all things cloud-native - particularly APIs, Microservices, Docker, Kubernetes (EKS / AKS / GKE), and CICD
  • Strong ability to drive strategic decisions on infrastructure-based products, including pricing, SLA, GTM, and more
  • Individuals with strong interpersonal skills & who consider themselves a strong contributor
  • Experience with methods and tools used within Product development; e.g. user experience/ stories mapping, product roadmap building & PM tools
  • Experience creating and submitting abstracts and delivering talks at conferences
  • Start-up experience is a major plus
  • Solid communication skills in English
